column4: "Ana ɔwo ihu iyi dɛ odzi mu
column5: Na ese dɛ Nyankopɔn beyi me efi mu yi?"

column3: Ebɛn yie na ɔbɛyɛ ama wo? Na
Na wo mfɛfo a wɔka wo ho no."
na hu; Na hwɛ wimu a ɔkrɔn sen wo no."
ebɛnadze na eyɛ tsia no? Na sɛ wo mbrato dɔɔ so a
ebɛnadze na edze ma no? Anaa ebɛnadze na ɔgye no wɔ wo nsamu?"

column2: "Nyimpa a ɔtse dɛ ɔwo na wo ndzeyɛbɔn bɛka no; Na nyimpa ba na wo tsenenee bɛyɛ no mfaso."
"Ahohiahia dodow ntsi na ɔma wosu frɛ; Akatakyi basa ntsi na ɔma wosu frɛ mboa."

column3: Ehen na mo Bɔfo Nyankopɔn wɔ

column2: "Nyia ɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɛn sen asaase do mbowa
column3: Na ɔyɛ hɛn enyansafo sen sor ntumbowa no?"

column4: Osian nyimpa bɔn hɔn nkontompɔ ntsi."

column3: Nkyii so Otumfo no rummbu no hwee."

column2: "Na akantam mber a ɔwo erese dɛ ɔwo nnhu no no
"Ntsi na Job bue n’ano wɔ egyangyansɛm mu; Na okwetsir nyimdzee na ɔma ne nsɛm dɔɔ so no."
